text: Branko Grünbaum (2 October 1929 – 14 September 2018) was a Yugoslavian-born American mathematician and a professor emeritus at the University of Washington in Seattle. He wrote over 200 papers, mostly in discrete geometry, an area in which he was known for many classification theorems. He has written on the theory of abstract polyhedra. Grünbaum died in Seattle on 14 September 2018 at the age of 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * Personal web page Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Yugoslavian people Category:American mathematicians Category:University of Washington faculty Category:Scientists from Seattle
title: Branko Grünbaum
